Html:
Hi,

Has anyone done an example of a Docking Window in WPF. Maybe something similar to the SolutionExplorer is VS2008, or the Docking Windows in ExpressionBlend Studio? I think this would be a component that many folks would be interested in.

thanks in advance!
Bill
Many folks are interested in them and there are plenty of components out there that do it. Or were you asking for source code?

Hi Divelements,

Yes - we were wondering if anyone is sharing examples of a Docking Property window. I thought at one point that the Blend team might share this but haven't received it.

thanks,
Bill
